eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: San Miguel, CO; AT 01:27 PM ON SEP 13, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 01:57 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: 9/13 2:15 pm: The National Weather Service has confirmed lightning strikes within 10-12 miles of Telluride Town Park. The weather is being closely monitored at this time. The Town of Telluride and Telluride Blues & Brews Festival will inform attendees of when/if an evacuation is necessary.
